ROM.Changelog:
** dotOS Changelog** ------------------- Droid On Time!
* welcome to dotos-1.2 * Merged December Security patch *More visual bug fixes *QS tiles track color accent. *Added Network Indicator (Settings->Data Usage). *Added Changelog section inside About. *New settings icons. *Re-work on overall app icons. *Some new dope walls. *And many more bug fixes and performace enhancements.
device specific * cleaned and reset all repos for more efficiency * more supportive audio * tweaks for latest security patch
